:insert-tm[@tmtype=reg].label: t__Registered trademark
:insert-tm[@tmtype=reg].description: t__Provides notice that the preceding word or symbol is a trademark or service mark that has been registered with a national trademark office.

:insert-tm[@tmtype=service].label: t__Servicemark
:insert-tm[@tmtype=service].description: t__A servicemark is a trademark used in the United States and several other countries to identify a service rather than a product.

:insert-tm[@tmtype=tm].label: t__Trademark
:insert-tm[@tmtype=tm].description: t__Identifies a term or phrase that is trademarked.
